name: Dory
catchline: Low tech fish in a high tech sub

abilities.name: Short Term Memory Loss
info: When Dory is inflicted with a Damaging Debuff, she gains a Forgetful Charge for 3 seconds, Cleansing all Damaging Debuffs from all allies on expiry. This effect can only occur once every 7 seconds.
Dory is Immune to Focus Buffs and Focus Debuffs.
Dory's Heavy Attack can hit and Knock Back all enemies in a wide arc in front of her.

abilities.name: Just Keep Swimming
info: All other allies Heal 2.5% each second for 6 seconds.
Dory Knocks Back all enemies around her.
Dory gains a Second Wind Buff for 8 seconds. When this effect expires she Heals for 60% of damage taken. (Max Stacks: 1)

abilities.name: Fish Tank
info: Dory gains 50% Defense at the start of each encounter.
The potency of Dory's Second Wind Buff from her Special Ability is increased by an additional 35%.

talents.name: Bubbly
talents.info: Grants +20% Health at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Reinforced Plating
talents.info: Grants +20% Defense at the start of an encounter.

talents.name: Have We Met?
talents.info: Dory gains 20% Armor for each Damaging Debuff Cleansed from her by her Forgetful Charge.

talents.name: Great First Impression
talents.info: The first time an enemy hits Dory each combat they receive a -20% Focus Debuff for 15 seconds [Max Stacks: 3]. This effect can be triggered again every time a Forgetful Charge on her expires. Dory’s Special Ability Lures all Ranged enemies for 8 seconds.

talents.name: Blinding Optimism
talents.info: Enemies that hit Dory with a Critical Hit receive a -50% Critical Damage Debuff for 8 seconds [Max Stacks: 1]. When Dory activates her Special Ability, she Cleanses Root from all allies.

talents.name: Can't Quite Remember
talents.info: Dory Resists 10% damage from Ranged enemies. When Dory activates her Special Ability, she gains a Forgetful Charge for 3 seconds.
